author: kkolinko
msg: 1. For Catalina/Jasper tasks, the taskdef is no longer needed,
as JspC now explicitly implements Task (BZ 53032) and so does not need a TaskAdapter,
and all other tasks implement Task.

jmxEquals and jmxCondition conditions from "jmxaccessor.tasks" file and
